profile.title: Umwirondoro w’umukoresha
profile.mustLogin: Ugomba kwinjira (login) kugira ngo ubone igenamiterere.
profile.noPrivateKey: Nta urufunguzo rwihariye kuri iyi mashini rwo kohereza.
profile.setBackupPassword: Shyiraho ijambo ry'ibanga ryo kubika kopi y'inyuma:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kopi y’inyuma (backup) ifite umutekano yamanutse neza.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Andika ijambo ry’ibanga rya kopi y’inyuma:
profile.importSuccess: Urufunguzo rwihariye rwinjijwe kuri iyi mashini.
profile.importFailed: Byanze kwinjiza urufunguzo (ijambo ry’ibanga ritari ryo cyangwa dosiye yangiritse).
profile.keysRotated: Urufunguzo rushya rwakozwe kandi urufunguzo rusanzwe rwasohowe.
profile.importKey: Kwinjiza kopi y’inyuma y’urufunguzo ifite umutekano
profile.keyDisclaimer: Urufunguzo rwawe rwihariye ntiruvamo kuri iyi mashini. Kohereza kopi irinzwe n’ijambo ry’ibanga kugirango usubizeho kuri indi mashini.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Urimo gukoresha verisiyo y’ubuntu—koresha amahitamo yihuse ya Izuba/Ijoro. Kuzamura urwego kugirango ufungure insanganyamatsiko nyinshi.
profile.backupDesc: Hanga kopi z’inyuma zirinze n’ijambo ry’ibanga z’amakuru yawe, hanyuma uzisubize kuri indi mashini kugira ngo uhuzwe.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Siba cyangwa jima ubutumwa by default
profile.followHint: Inkuru zabo zizagaragara muri ‘Following’ yawe niba bashyizeho inkuru zigaragara ku bakurikira cyangwa rubanda.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ohereza amasura n’ubutumwa biva ku nimero yawe yemejwe cyangwa imeri. Ubutumwa bwo kohereza bushobora kugaragaza nimero yawe ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Hitamo ubutumwa cyangwa icyumba cyo kuganiriramo kugira ngo utangire ikiganiro
